solution_line_template: She has {total_minutes} minutes to practice because {hours_available} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{hours_available}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes}

She has already spent {minutes_spent} minutes on her work because {piano_minutes} + {writing_minutes} + {reading_minutes} = <<{piano_minutes}+{writing_minutes}+{reading_minutes}={minutes_spent}>>{minutes_spent}
She has {minutes_left} minutes to use on finger exercise because {total_minutes}-{minutes_spent} = <<{total_minutes}-{minutes_spent}={minutes_left}>>{minutes_left}
